allow:
Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove incenteev/composer-parameter-handler

Legacy dependency from Symfony 3 era. No longer used since the project
migrated to .env-based configuration with Symfony 4+.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove composer/package-versions-deprecated

Superseded by Composer 2''s built-in InstalledVersions class.
No usage found in the codebase.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove sonata-project/intl-bundle

Bundle was registered but had no configuration and no active usage
in templates or source code.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unit tests for untested components

Adds 205 new unit tests covering:
- StringUtil: camelCaseToUnderscore conversion
- ClassUtil: class name extraction from FQCN and objects
- Coord/Coordinate: value objects, array conversion, directional comparisons
- RideNamer: ISO and German date formatters, RideNamerList collection
- Twig extensions: ColorTwigExtension, DateTimeTwigExtension,
  SocialNetworkTwigExtension \(trimIntro\), VelocityExtension,
  DurationTwigExtension
- ParticipationCityList/Item: counter logic and city deduplication
- ParticipationTable hierarchy: Day, Month, Year, Table with
  Iterator/Countable contract tests
- Frontpage RideList: Day sorting, Month grouping, MonthList collection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix inverted condition in VelocityExtension::averageVelocity

The guard clause checked if all required data was present and then
returned null, which is the opposite of the intended behavior.
It should return null when data is missing, not when it''s available.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unit tests for StringUtil and ClassUtil

Tests for camelCaseToUnderscore conversion \(empty strings, consecutive
uppercase, double underscores\) and class name extraction from FQCN
and objects \(shortname, lowercase, lcfirst\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unit tests for Coord and Coordinate

Tests for value object construction, null handling, array conversions
\(toArray, toInversedArray, toLatLngArray, toLatLonArray\) and
directional comparisons \(northOf, southOf, eastOf, westOf\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unit tests for RideNamer components

Tests for IsoCityDateRideNamer and GermanCityDateRideNamer title
generation, and RideNamerList collection behavior including lookup
by FQCN and overwrite semantics.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unit tests for Twig extensions

Tests for ColorTwigExtension \(RGB to hex\), DateTimeTwigExtension
\(interval addition, immutability\), DurationTwigExtension \(null
handling, humanization\), and SocialNetworkTwigExtension trimIntro
\(HTML stripping, sentence boundary detection\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix inverted condition in VelocityExtension and add tests

The guard clause returned null when all data was present instead of
when data was missing. Add tests verifying velocity calculation
\(e.g. 15km/2h = 7.5 km/h\) and null returns for missing data.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unit tests for ParticipationCityList

Tests for ParticipationCityListItem counter logic and fluent interface,
and ParticipationCityList deduplication, Countable contract, and mixed
city additions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/maltehubner/Documents/criticalmass-one/criticalmass-in commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unit tests for ParticipationTable hierarchy

Tests for ParticipationDay, ParticipationMonth, ParticipationYear, and
ParticipationTable including Iterator/Countable contracts, calendar-
correct day counts \(leap years\), month routing, and descending year
iteration.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
